duties_responsibilities.duty: Conducting antimicrobial tests (ISO 22196, TM100, ASTM2149, etc.) on prototype materials.
Adapting existing antibacterial procedures and international standards to develop in-house tests for evaluating new materials.
Troubleshooting microbiology results to evaluate chemical processes and surface modification.
Planning and executing QA on client projects.
Presenting test results on a regular basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's in Microbiology or a related field
